events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving their vehicle hitting a tree at an intersection, requesting urgent claim processing.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial report including the collision details and involved parties.
An agent was assigned to handle the auto accident claim to provide assistance and coordinate next steps with the customer.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming that their vehicle collision claim has been received and is under review.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and insurance documents from the customer to proceed with the investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and multiple images of the car damage for assessment.
The investigation into the vehicle collision claim was initiated to determine fault and damage valuation.
Investigation finalized concluding that the collision impact caused extensive damage warranting a full vehicle repair.
Proposed settlement amount shared with the customer based on repair estimates and insurance policy coverage limits.
Customer responded expressing concerns that the settlement offer is insufficient to cover all vehicle repairs needed.
Claim was escalated to senior adjuster following customer dissatisfaction with the initial settlement proposal.
Claim approval granted after revised assessment raising the settlement offer to better meet repair costs.
Payment was issued promptly to the customerâ€™s preferred account to cover approved vehicle repair expenses.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed following payment and confirmation of repair initiation by the customer.
All claim files and correspondence have been archived in the system for future reference and compliance purposes.
